casebody.data:
March 10, 1967.

No. -.

Kitzer et al. v. Devitt, U. S. District Judge. Myer H. Gladstone for applicants. Solicitor General Marshall, Assistant Attorney General Vinson, Beatrice Rosenberg and Sidney M. Glazer for the United States in opposition.

D. C. Minn. Application for a stay of the trial of United States v. Kitzer in the United States District Court for the District of North Dakota, presented to Mr. Justice White, and by him referred to the Court, denied.
